targets.query: SELECT mean("used") AS "used", mean("free") AS "free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("node_id"::tag =~ /^$node_id$/ AND "path"::tag = '$path') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "path"::tag fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM disk WITH KEY = "path"
list.label: Storage path
list.name: path
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM disk WITH KEY = "path"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES  FROM diskio WITH KEY = "name"
list.label: Storage disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES  FROM diskio WITH KEY = "name"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface"
list.name: netif
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface"
